data.comment: The first-half is under way at Estadio do Maracana - Fluminense kick-off to start the match.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 8, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 9, Rafael Traci awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick Palmeiras.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 14, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Goal! Luiz Adriano gives Palmeiras a 0-1 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
Great play from Bruno Henrique to set up the goal.
In the minute 16, Fred (Fluminense) has received a yellow card from Rafael Traci.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a Fluminense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 22, Free kick Fluminense.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 25, Fluminense have a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 27, In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense attack through Evanilson. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a Fluminense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luan Garcia (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 30, Rafael Traci awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Estadio do Maracana.
Gabriel Menino (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Odair Hellmann is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Marcos Paulo replacing Fred.
In the minute 34, Fluminense are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 35, Free kick Fluminense.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 36, Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 39, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Evanilson.
That's a fine assist from Marcos Paulo.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense's Dodi breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Fluminense.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Fluminense's Igor Juliao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
It's Palmeiras with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Evanilson for Fluminense is whistled offside.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 48, Fluminense drive upfield and Michel Araujo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rony for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, Rafael Traci awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 51, Gabriel Menino for Palmeiras has been booked by Rafael Traci and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Estadio do Maracana.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense just outside Palmeiras's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Estadio do Maracana.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In the minute 59, The away team replace Rony with Patrick de Paula.
Willian is replacing Raphael Veiga for the away team.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Lucas Lima is replacing Gabriel Menino for Palmeiras at Estadio do Maracana.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 63, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 66, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
The home team have replaced Yago Felipe with Ganso. This is the second substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
In the minute 69, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Fluminense.
Palmeiras push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Patrick de Paula gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Evanilson.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) is making a fourth substitution, with Gustavo Scarpa replacing Ze Rafael.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Bruno Henrique with Ramires. This is the fifth substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Luiz Henrique replacing Nene.
In the minute 75, Evanilson, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Wellington Silva is the substitute for Fluminense.
Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fluminense.
Luiz Henrique's header is off-target for Fluminense.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Free kick Fluminense.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 78, Wellington Silva (Fluminense) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Gustavo Scarpa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rafael Traci awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In Rio de Janeiro Palmeiras attack through Luiz Adriano. The finish is off target, however.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Luiz Henrique for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Gustavo Scarpa (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
